description: {"blocks":[{"key":"8fi4f","text":"This protocol describes surface protein labeling with biotin using EZ-Link Sulfo-NHS\u0002LC-Biotin. This chemical reacts with primary amines such as lysine but does not  permeate cell membranes because of the charge. Thus, it only biotinylates surface  proteins.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

journals.name: Neuron

There are many washing steps. Thus, cells may detach from the dishes. If this occurs, coat dishes with poly-D-lysine.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2md3d","text":"Discard biotin containing medium. Quench and remove unbound biotin using   glycine in ice-cold PBS for   at .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":73,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":103,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":107,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eqc9n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"","data":{"concentration":"50","error_concentration":false,"guid":"91A0C0904E5911EC930D670E28A148BB","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"975468704E5911EC930D670E28A148BB","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"997A55B04E5911EC930D670E28A148BB","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bfp8p","text":"Wash 2-3 times with ice-cold PBS. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eu2h6","text":"Incubate the same amount of lysates (  to  ) with streptavidin or NeutraAvidin beads for   to   at  to pull-down the biotinylated proteins.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":37,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":42,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":89,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":94,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":98,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3mu5a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"1911E8B04E5A11EC930D670E28A148BB","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"1000","error":false,"guid":"1C5FDB304E5A11EC930D670E28A148BB","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"21082D904E5A11EC930D670E28A148BB","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"23781C204E5A11EC930D670E28A148BB","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}},"4":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"27070F404E5A11EC930D670E28A148BB","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1og4o","text":"Run eluate samples on a SDS polyacrylamide gel and perform western blotting to visualize labeling (and thus evidence of surface expression) of the protein of interest. Total cell lysates can be used to determine the expression level.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
